BSF Recruitment 2025 - Apply online for 3588 Constable Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 23, 2025, 10:47 IST
 Border Security Force
 3,588 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Jul-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 21,700 to 69,100




FOLLOW

The Border Security Force (BSF) has declared the official notification for 3588 Constable Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI can grab this chance and apply for the BSF Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs across India.

BSF Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Constable	3588	10th Pass, ITI

Age Limit for the BSF Notification 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 25 years.

Selection Process for the BSF Notification 2025

Written Exam
Physical Test
Document Verification
Medical Examination

Salary Structure  for the BSF Notification 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 21,700 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 69,100 /- per month.

Application fee  for the BSF Notification 2025

Refer Official Notification.
How to Apply  for the BSF Notification 2025
Visit the Official Website.
Go to the Recruitment or career page.
Check for the Constable Notification 2025.
Read the Notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Log in with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Upload the scanned required documents to the application form.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and take a printout of the application form for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	26-07-2025
Last Date of Application	25-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
